description: Specifies options for initializing Link for use with the Statements product. This field is required for the statements product.

start_date.description: The start date for statements, in [ISO 8601](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) "YYYY-MM-DD" format, e.g. "2020-10-30".

end_date.description: The end date for statements, in [ISO 8601](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) "YYYY-MM-DD" format, e.g. "2020-10-30". You can request up to two years of data.
